keyPolicies.policyTitle: I WILL ALWAYS PUT YOU FIRST
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Your needs are my priority. I have never misused my position as MP and never will.
A good education is a right, not a privilege. Our children deserve to fulfill their potential.
Essential NHS services must stay local. Cash won for our area must be spent on our needs.
Older residents deserve a decent income and an end to age discrimination.
I will fight for continued investment in road, rail and jobs, and policing resources to keep crime falling.

issues.health: HANDS OFF THE CONQUEST HOSPITAL - Essential NHS services must stay local. Cash won for our area must be spent on our needs.

contactInformation.address: 84 Bohemia Road, St Leonards on Sea, TN37 6RN

images.caption: Michael Foster Putting local people first

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Dom Collins on behalf of Michael Foster
